query.sql:
SELECT p.period_name, a.account_name, SUM(IFNULL(l.dr_amount,0)-IFNULL(l.cr_amount,0)) amount, a.priority FROM exp_item i, exp_item_line l, exp_account a, exp_period p WHERE i.item_id = l.item_id AND a.account_id = l.account_id AND a.account_type = '0' AND i.period_id = p.period_id and p.book_id = ${@book_id} and i.book_id = ${@book_id} #AND_CLAUSE# GROUP BY i.period_id,l.account_id
UNION ALL
SELECT p.period_name, '合计' account_name, SUM(IFNULL(l.dr_amount,0)-IFNULL(l.cr_amount,0)) amount, 99999 priority FROM exp_item i, exp_item_line l, exp_account a, exp_period p WHERE i.item_id = l.item_id AND a.account_id = l.account_id AND a.account_type = '0' AND i.period_id = p.period_id and p.book_id = ${@book_id} and i.book_id = ${@book_id} #AND_CLAUSE# GROUP BY i.period_id
